name: Scott
what_you_do: Business coach specializing in LinkedIn strategy, helping entrepreneurs and coaches generate organic leads, build authentic connections, and grow their businesses using LinkedIn.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, business coaches, consultants, online business owners, and network marketers seeking organic lead generation through LinkedIn.
offering: LinkedIn optimization training, one-on-one coaching, group mastermind programs, and proven systems for organic lead generation and personal brand building.
social_proof: 3 best-selling books, over 2,000 clients served, 500+ written testimonials on LinkedIn, over 23 years as an entrepreneur, trainer for several top financial firms, internationally acclaimed and award-winning network marketer, featured in MarketWatch, Daily Herald, Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, Buffalo News, AZ Central, RFD TV, WBOC, Suncoast News Network. Company has generated over 3 million in revenue on LinkedIn.
signature_programs: LinkedIn Accelerator Virtual Program, One on One Coaching (6-week intensive), Expert Authority Mastermind (year-long program), The LinkedIn Book for Network Marketers (best-selling book), Networking and Marketing Made Simple (top ranking podcast), The Perfect Profile (free guide)
audience_type: B2B, coaches, consultants, online business owners, network marketers
business_focus: Teaching entrepreneurs and coaches how to use LinkedIn to generate consistent organic leads and grow their businesses through authentic connection.
service_provided: LinkedIn profile optimization, one-on-one business coaching, group coaching mastermind, online courses, podcasting, speaking, book authorship
